points: Well-qualified IT professional with over 17+ years of experience, in which 5+ years in Front end / Web development
Worked on various domain like Insurance, Manufacturing and Health Care
Experience in building web application using React.js, ReactNative, Redux, Node.js,  HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript, and Webpack
Experience in React Native to build responsive website for different devices, such as desktop, laptop, mobile, and iPad.
Undergone various training on Full Stack Web Development in Coursera & eggHead. (Html, JavaScript, AngularJs, NodeJS, BootStrap, MongoDB, ReactJs, Redux)
Handled multiple projects in VC++ MFC, experience in Socket Programming, Multithreading applications
Worked as Project Test lead in US and Handled Defect tracking in QC, Presenting Quality Metrics to Client/VP Level
Performed Regression Testing, Smoke Testing, Functional Testing, Integration & System Testing, UAT support up to Go/No Go decision
Experience in Project Management activities like creating WBS, Estimation, managing risk, project monitoring and controlling, managing deliveries etc
Worked on Offshore/Onsite Model, Performed major role in Requirement Analysis and interacting with client throughout SDLC
